name: External Links Advertisement Note
author: David Schlegl

sections.description:
External links will be marked as advertisement. You can choose your own word and style.

More about the plugin https://www.blogofant.de/elan or https://www.davidschlegl.at

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.
sections.installation:
Easy installation

  1. Upload bfelan.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can you choose your own word?

Yes it is possible
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Release

1.0.1

  • Little Changes in two files

1.0.2

  • Textsize as option
